title: President at Moragahakanda: ‘Yes we can’ paid dividends
content: Daily News – By Rasika Somarathna President Mahinda Rajapaksa yesterday emphasized that the present Government’s ‘Yes we can’ approach had paid rich dividends in delivering the people’s desired expectations in many spheres including the defeat of terrorism and development. He said that the difference between this Government and other regimes was that the present one…
